name: Pinkpop

config_properties.name: Pinkpop
config_properties.description: The longest-running annual music festival in the Netherlands, held in Landgraaf since 1970.

ai_profile:
**Pinkpop 2026 Festival Profile**

Pinkpop 2026 continues its rich tradition of showcasing a diverse blend of genres and artists, with 32 acts spanning a wide musical spectrum. Alternative Rock leads the charge with eight acts, closely followed by Pop (7) and Indie Rock (6), while niche genres like Electropunk, Rave Rock, and Symphonic Pop add a unique flavor to the lineup. With an average artist rating of 6.88, the festival promises a solid mix of crowd-pleasers and emerging talent, with a notable 22 performers rated above 7.0 by audiences.

The lineup highlights an impressive international presence, with acts hailing from the United Kingdom (9), the United States (9), and the Netherlands (7), alongside artists from Germany, Canada, and beyond. However, despite the global reach, there is limited representation from artists of color, with only one performer falling into this category. Gender diversity is more balanced, featuring 8 female-led acts, 4 mixed-gender groups, and 20 male-driven performances, offering a range of perspectives on stage.

While the festival leans heavily on rock and indie influences, it also embraces a mix of styles, from Hip-Hop and R&B to Punk Rock and Electronic. This eclectic blend ensures something for every music lover, maintaining Pinkpop’s reputation as a melting pot of sounds. With no DJs on the roster this year, the focus remains firmly on live band performances, keeping the festival’s classic vibe alive while celebrating both established names and fresh talent.
